bio:
Snipes-Many-Innocents, an Argonian bandit, is a member of the criminal gang Thorina's Cutters and a bodyguard to Thorina herself. He can be found in the tower of the Cutter's headquarters at Cutpurse Hideout. He will attack intruders on sight alongside Thorina and fellow bodyguard Enchanter Brecius.
He is equipped with bandit archer light armor and weapons.
name: Snipes-Many-Innocents
